DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : With development surgical technique , people coronary heart disease underwent non-cardiac surgery , include abdominal , urologic , orthopedic surgery . Due vulnerable heart function , geriatric patient suffer high incidence cardiovascular event peri-operative period . Some study find EA precondition protective effect patient underwent Cardiac surgery . But non one address effect EA precondition outcome patient coronary heart disease undergo non-cardiac surgery . DESIGNING : The patient coronary heart disease receive abdominal surgery randomly assign EA precondition group control group . The patient EA precondition group treat bilateral Neiguan ( PC 6 ) ，Lieque ( LU 7 ) Yunmen ( LU 2 ) electrical stimulation ( 5—30 Hz，2．34—6．24 mA，30 min ) 5 consecutive day surgery．Before operation surgery , surgery , 24h , 72h post surgery , patient subject test serum level c-reactive protein Troponin I . The EEG heart ultrasonic exam use evaluate condition function heart surgery .
